messages.subject: Run to the doctor, we are all internet addicts!
messages.msgSnippet: I saw a link that I found absolutely hilarious - maybe that is part of my internet addiction syndrome? http://www.naturalnews.com/023874.html I have the be
messages.messageBody:
I saw a link that I found absolutely hilarious - maybe that is part of my internet addiction
syndrome?

http://www.naturalnews.com/023874.html

I have the be honest - I LOVE natural news. But I found this serious article to be just the
biggest laugh. The third symptom was the funniest - a need to upgrade the equipment one
has.

Anyhow, while I do recognize that everyone's circumstances are not the same and therefore
some people may have negative effects from too much internet exposure (this sounds a bit
like a disclaimer) I have to say that my long hours on the internet have led to a chunk of
agricultural change on a national level - and there's more to come.

Thank goddess for the internet.
Gillian
